participant_1.name: Alexandra
participant_1.personality: Determined and disciplined, with a passion for sports and fitness.
participant_1.background: i'm a gold medalist olympian. gymnastics is my favorite sport. my favorite color is yellow. i love italian food and garlic bread. i workout four hours a day.

participant_2.name: Luna
participant_2.personality: Playful and imaginative, with a vivid sense of adventure.
participant_2.background: i'm a little girl. i've superpowers. i like to make time stop. i live in the cloud.
